name: Blueberry Preserves
description: Crafted from ripe, handpicked blueberries, this preserve captures a burst of sweet-tart flavor with a velvety texture. Perfect for spreading on scones, swirling into yogurt, or elevating your dessert recipes.
ingredients: Blueberries, organic cane sugar, lemon juice, pectin

name: Tomato Ketchup
description: A classic ketchup made from sun-ripened tomatoes, blended with a perfect balance of sweetness and tang. Ideal for burgers, fries, or as a base for your favorite sauces.
ingredients: Tomatoes, organic cane sugar, vinegar, salt, spices

name: Salsa Verde
description: A vibrant, zesty salsa verde crafted from fresh tomatillos and green chilies, with a hint of lime. Perfect for tacos, grilled meats, or as a bold dip for tortilla chips.
ingredients: Tomatillos, green chilies, lime juice, cilantro, salt, garlic

name: BBQ Sauce
description: A smoky, tangy BBQ sauce with a rich blend of spices and a touch of sweetness. Elevate your grilled dishes, ribs, or use as a dipping sauce for a bold flavor kick.
ingredients: Tomato paste, molasses, apple cider vinegar, smoked paprika, garlic, spices

name: Yellow Mastard
description: A smooth and tangy yellow mustard with a classic bite, made from high-quality mustard seeds. Perfect for sandwiches, hot dogs, or adding zest to your marinades.
ingredients: Mustard seeds, vinegar, water, salt, turmeric

name: Strawberry Preserves
description: Bursting with the sweet, juicy essence of handpicked strawberries, this preserve offers a smooth texture and vibrant flavor. Ideal for toast, pastries, or pairing with soft cheeses.
ingredients: Strawberries, organic cane sugar, lemon juice, pectin

name: Strawberry Rhubarb Preserves
description: A delightful blend of sweet strawberries and tart rhubarb, this preserve strikes a perfect balance of flavors. Spread it on biscuits or use it to enhance your desserts.
ingredients: Strawberries, rhubarb, organic cane sugar, lemon juice, pectin

name: Raspberry Preserves
description: Made from plump, handpicked raspberries, this preserve delivers a bright, slightly tart flavor with a silky texture. Perfect for toast, cakes, or as a complement to savory dishes.
ingredients: Raspberries, organic cane sugar, lemon juice, pectin

name: Blackberry Preserves
description: We begin with plump, handpicked blackberries and work to preserve the uniquely robust texture and tang. This luxurious spread is ideal for your morning toast, stirring into oatmeal, or complementing your cheese and charcuterie board.
ingredients: Blackberries, organic cane sugar, lemon juice, pectin
